A1.body: Hi, lieutenant. What are you looking for in my humble little room?
A1.speaker: Lucky Diamond

A1(1).body: Hey, Lucky. You were on duty yesterday, weren't you? Second day in a row?
A1(1).speaker: Strikely

A2.body: Yes, I was seriously harnessed. The second day without sleep. Don't ask me why ... it's too embarrassing to tell.
A2.speaker: Lucky Diamond

A2(1).body: Okay, I won't. Is the colonel there?
A2(1).speaker: Strikely

A3.body: Yes, he's in his office, as usual.
A3.speaker: Lucky Diamond

A3(1).body: Thank you, Lucky. I hope you get out of here soon.
A3(1).speaker: Strikely

A2(2).body: Come on, you can share it with me. I promise I won't tell anypony.
A2(2).speaker: Strikely

A5.body: With all due respect, Lieutenant... Strikely, I can't. I know you're curious, but I just want to forget everything that happened...
A5.speaker: Lucky Diamond

A6.body: Khem, Lieutenant. I am pleased that you have visited me, but surely you have come to me for some purpose?
A6.speaker: Lucky Diamond

A6(1).body: Okay, I'm sorry, I understand. Is the Colonel in?
A6(1).speaker: Strikely

A4.body: Oh, well... I thought you might have come to see me... Well, good luck out there, then... you come to me... at least sometimes...
A4.speaker: Lucky Diamond

A4(1).body: I'm sorry, there's no time. I'll come in, I promise.
A4(1).speaker: Strikely
